q: Beast.`` Earlier this week, the Daily Mirror U.K. and others reported that Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt are in the process of adopting a child from Haiti,'' Waldman said in a statement. There is no truth to these rumors.`` Rather, Ms. Angelina Jolie is focused on enhancing the welfare and legal protection of children within Haiti. As such, she has been meeting with government of Haiti officials, Haitian legal experts and non-governmental organizations regarding a new initiative of the Brad Pitt Foundation. The recently launched Angelina Jolie Legal Fellows Program will assist the justice system in Haiti to improve child protection, the statement added. Angelina Jolie , 35, and partner Brad Pitt have six children, three of whom-- Maddox, Pax and Zahara-- were adopted from Vietnam and Ethiopia respectively. The

Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said,`` The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't.'' Bill Lockyer 's point-- a valid one-- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments
